text: We are uploading one blog template in Marketplace. In last step "Preview your product",  it always previews posts from the  "default" blog. We have created another blog with demo posts but preview is not pulling posts from that blog. Is there any way to hint preview page to load posts from particular blog rather than default blog?
Can you preview it with options and change it here?
Thanks Pete. The issue is with Marketplace preview.  I can properly see the preview with intended posts but when marketplace tries to pull the preview, it shows default posts.
